name: ImageJ threshold rosin
title: ImageJ threshold rosin
description: Implements Rosin's thresholding method for unimodal distributions.
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Anjali Taneja, Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health
citation: Rosin, Paul L. Unimodal thresholding. Pattern recognition 34.11 (2001): 2083-2096.
